attributes.action: Introduce Compulsary Unicycle Riding Lessons For The Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the Primeminister should "Introduce Compulsary Unicycle Riding Lessons For The Armed Forces" becuase it would teach our soldiers the benifits of balance over simple brute force.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
